creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: abstract image; white background with a large, oblong blob shape in center, rendered in black pigment around top and bottom, and gradated grayish-blue and cream in center; blob shape is dimensional and layered; black horizontal blurred line in center, dividing the image; two round spots of green pigment at top of blob; faint, circular pencil marks around bottom half of blob shape
medium: Vinyl adhesive, acrylic and graphite pencil on canvas
title: Balance-15
